scenario_text.value:
I couldn’t even see that monster when it
attacked us before.
Is it really going to come after us again?

Don’t worry, Aoi! I’ll protect you no matter
what!

Yeah, and don’t forget about us. As long as
we all work together, I’m sure we’ll be fine.

Yes... Yes, you’re right. I shouldn’t let my
fears get the better of me.

I shouldn’t let my fears get the better of
me. Let’s go find Saki and the others.
